subject: Re: Order #SSN4056 confirmed
description_text:
Hi there,

My wheel was finally released by customs and received it yesterday.

The wheel is now connected and for the most part working.  Tho I noticed the bottom right rotatory knub is not working or registering any inputs in any title or when checking in a controller profile.

Cheers,
David Slute

conversations.body_text: Hi david slute,  The knob is not damaged. The 12-position knob on the right is used to control the functionality of the left knob. For example, when the left knob is rotated left or right, it corresponds to button 17 and button 18. However, if the right knob is rotated first, the output of the left knob will switch to button 19 and button 20. Please note that this feature needs to be tested in-game, as Windows can only display the first 32 buttons, while the game itself can correctly recognize and display all 40 buttons.
